segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, everything seems so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate like it's the most important task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running full blast, and the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading down the cabinets, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle, oblivious to the mess she's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, those kids over by the cabinet are climbing on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching to grab cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; he could fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, reaching up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one is paying attention to all this danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies are going to cause more trouble than they're worth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene makes me want to yell and stop it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
